attributes.action: Demand French Government stops using killing and maiming French citizens.
attributes.additional_details: There are very many video from French citizens recording these atrocities. They have contacted us begging for world leaders to condem the French Government.
attributes.background: 16 French citizens killed limbs blown off by exploding grenade thousands maimed by police. The violence used by French police is extreme and not acceptable In a decent country. It is more what you’d expect from Saddam Hussain.
